comments:
releng tools v3.0.4

silently, forcing me to release the code manually. The following is written to
the log file:

I saw this same problem trying to release for I200411230800 using 
I200411170800.
Restarting Eclipse seemed to fix it for me.

The error is due to a bug in the J9 VM. However, the wizard should have better 
error handling.
I believe this is fixed in the plugin available on the 3.1M4 download page.
